From the brand

Protect Your Tools

The Ryker Bag was Created to be an Accessible and Affordable Brand that Makes Every Manual Laborer’s Life Easier for Efficiency, Organization and Transport.

We’ve Taken Everything we Know About Tools and Created the Most Compact and Most Convenient Roll Up Bag that we know how.

Now it’s Your Turn to Enjoy the Benefit of our Vast Experience and the Expertise of the Designers who Put this Dream into Action!

Shop The Ryker Bag

Compact Design for More Tools – we’ve Developed a Tool Roll Bag of a Perfect Size – you’d Be Surprised by How Many Tools Fit in This Small Tool Bag : Place Wrenches Pliers Ratchets and More Into this Roll Up Tool Pouch
6 Pockets for All your Gear – This Roll Organizer has 4 Compartments for Tools & 2 Detachable + D Loops – a Unique Feature in Case You Need to Carry Smaller Items Like Drill Bits Screws & Spare Parts
Premium Quality & Ultra Durable Materials – This Roll Up Tool Bag is Made from Premium Materials – Rust Proof Zippers , Quality Straps with Reliable Buckles and a Water , Grease & Rip Resistant Heavy Duty Fabric , Strong as a Canvas Tool Roll – This Toll Roll Will Keep Your Tools Safe in Extreme Work Conditions
Easy to Carry & Hang – Keep your Tools & Accessories Organized and Carry Them in a Folded Roll Up Organizer – Hang The Tool Bag Organizer in Your Car Garage or Workshop
A Great & Useful Gift – This Tool Roll Organizer is a Must Have for any Skilled Workman ; Mechanic Repairman Carpenter Plumber Electrician & Hobbyist – The Wrench Roll Up Pouch can be Used as a Car / Motorcycle Tool Roll for Repairs or Emergency Kit – Don’t Miss a Chance to Buy a Gift that will Surely be Appreciated

The Ryker Bag was Created to be an Accessible and Affordable Brand that Makes Every Manual Laborer’s Life Easier for Organization and Transport.

We’ve Taken Everything we Know About Tools and Created the Most Compact and Most Convenient Roll Up Bag that we know how.

Now it’s Your Turn to Enjoy the Benefit of our Vast Experience and the Expertise of the Designers who Put this Dream into Action!

NEW 6 TOOL POUCHES DESIGN

  • 4 Long Pockets 11.8 x 3.3” with Heavy Duty Zippers for all your Tools, Cables, Cutters, and More.
  • 2 Short Removable Pockets 5.3 x 3” to House all those Little Bits & Pieces that so Easily get Lost. This Includes Nuts, Bolts, Screws, Anchors and More.
  • Each Small Tool Pouch comes with a D-clip which you can Clip onto your Pants or Belt for Super Convenience.

When it comes to Work Tools, you Need a Light-Weight, Compact, but Spacious Tools Bag to Organize and Carry them, and you Surely want it to be Sturdy and Safe. This is why we Designed the Ryker Tool Bag to Suit all your Tool Handling Needs, Packed it with Neat Features and Manufactured it from Premium Heavy-Duty Materials!

We Call it a Small Tool Roll Because it’s Certainly Smaller than the Average Tool Box but at 20.3” in Length and 12.8” Wide, this Handy Roll Up Tool Bag Provides you with all the Space you Need to Organize and Carry your Tools, Accessories, Cords, and any other Gear you may Need in your Day’s Work.

SUPER DURABLE – A TOOL BAG MADE FOR LIFE

FABRIC TO PROTECT

  • Made of heavy-duty 1000D fabric
  • Water resistant
  • Grease retardant
  • Rip resistant

Protect your work gear from harmful agents at work such as rust & dirt to keep them in the best condition for longer.

FOLD IT ANY WHICH WAY

Designed with your convenience in mind, there are many ways you can fold and carry the tool roll organizer. For this purpose there are several handles so you can carry your tools with maximum ease.

EXTREME ATTENTION TO DETAIL

  • All zippers are rust-proof and of the highest quality
  • Stitching is done with thick nylon thread
  • All straps and buckles are designed to make life easier for you.

Read more

LIMITLESS POSSIBILITIES FOR PROFESSIONALS, DIYers, STUDENTS & HOBBYISTS

ALL YOUR ESSENTIAL HAND TOOLS IN ONE PLACE

Safely store your wrenches, pliers, screwdrivers and more. No more running back to the car or the garage to find that missing tool.

CAR/BIKE REPAIR TOOLS

Save space in the back of your car with this compact tool option. You’ll never find yourself left out in the cold and without the necessary tools to fix your bike or car.

STUDENTS & HOBBYISTS

No more bulky and unsuitable bags. Arrive at your lesson or work spot, open up your Ryker roll up bag and see everything you need right in front of you.

GEEKS & TECHIES

Every possible

computer cable, part and accessory at your fingertips where you need it and when you need it. Organize & store for absolute control.

Read more

MORE GREAT FEATURES INCLUDE:

  • Metal Grommets to hang the bag when open on the wall
  • Additional outer D-Rings on which you can attach keys, tape measure and other small items
  • Mesh pocket on the front side. Place your name tag with telephone number so there’s no chance of you losing the bag and your precious tools.

Read more

4.5
Price: $43.74 - $34.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:07:56 UTC – Details)

Price: $9.54
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:09 UTC – Details)


3M Exterior Attachment Tape is a high performance automotive tape ideal for attaching exterior automotive body side moldings, wheel lip molding, door edge molding, badges, nameplates, emblems, LED Lights and trim.
Ideal for attaching moldings, emblems and trim to exterior painted automotive surfaces
For industrial/occupational use only. Not for consumer sale or use.

3M Exterior Attachment Tape

Details

  • Permanently attaches side moldings, trim and emblems to vehicle exteriors and interiors
  • Excellent for narrow width applications
  • High strength double-sided adhesive withstands weather and impact
  • Easy-to-use press-on tape eliminates tools and mess
  • An excellent alternative to rivets
  • Add long term value to your vehicles, quickly and easily

3M Exterior Attachment Tape is ideal for permanently attaching side moldings and trim to your vehicles, adding long-term protection and value. Use the same elastic bonding technology employed for airplanes and skyscrapers to attach narrow body moldings, trim and emblems to your vehicle. This tape features an extremely strong adhesive, and it’s also easy to use – just pull of the liner and apply.

A High-Performance Tape Specifically for Auto Exteriors

Designed specifically for auto care and maintenance, 3M Exterior Attachment Tape permanently attaches plastic, metal, carbon fiber and composite parts to your vehicle’s painted or unpainted surfaces. With this narrow-width tape, you can install side body moldings, drip rail moldings or fender and wheel trim to add instant protection against door dings and other hazards. Use this high-strength double-sided tape to add value to your vehicle by quickly installing or restoring decorative interior and exterior trim or factory emblems. The tape adhesive bonds instantly and holds up to impact, moisture and solvents used in routine maintenance.

Read more

Why Use Attachment Tape?

Unlike mechanical fasteners such as screws, rivets or clips, attachment tape does not require drilling or piercing holes in sheet metal which can lead to rust and corrosion. It goes on without the mess of other adhesives that can run, drip or smear, which means less cleanup during the installation and after it’s complete. The final installation is clean, low profile and very secure – just like in a professional shop.

3M Exterior Attachment Tape is exceptionally easy to use. You don’t need any special tools – just cut the tape with a scissors to the desired length. Then simply apply tape to the trim, light, emblem, body side, wheel lip or door edge molding, position, remove the peel-off liner and press the item in place on the vehicle exterior.

Reduced Vibration for a Smoother, Quieter Ride

By securely fastening trim, emblems, lights and other exterior items, 3M Exterior Attachment Tape can also help reduce unwanted noise and vibrations as you operate your vehicle. It can serve as a sound-deadener, reducing the vibration of loose parts and the resulting noise through your vehicle’s metal and aluminum components. This make rides quieter and smoother, and improves overall satisfaction with your vehicle even when you’re not driving it.

The Science of Better Auto Care from 3M

Since a 3M lab assistant invented masking tape in the 1930s, 3M has been developing products to help you get the most enjoyment and value from your vehicles. 3M Exterior Attachment Tape is a great example: instantly add value and longevity to your vehicle with moldings, emblems and other components, without tools or mess. This attachment tape is also an excellent example of what 3M does best – Science. Applied to Life.

Read more

4.5
Price: $9.54
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:09 UTC – Details)

item.title: Best Pet Supplies Dog Poop Bags for Waste Refuse Cleanup, Doggy Roll Replacements for Outdoor Puppy Walking and Travel, Leak Proof and Tear Resistant, Thick Plastic
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) HEAVY-DUTY BAGS DESIGNED WITH MOTHER NATURE IN MIND Looking for heavy-duty dog poop bags that don’t easily break? Smarter waste bags that you can confidently toss in the trash? Then you’ll love our new and improved doggy bags! We went back to the drawing board and created extra-strong leak-proof bags ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $6.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:11:38 UTC – Details)


HEAVY-DUTY BAGS DESIGNED WITH MOTHER NATURE IN MIND

Looking for heavy-duty dog poop bags that don’t easily break?

Smarter waste bags that you can confidently toss in the trash?

Then you’ll love our new and improved doggy bags!

We went back to the drawing board and created extra-strong leak-proof bags made using a
special ingredient. The secret behind this smart technology? A certified additive known as d2w.
It shortens the life of our bags at the end of its useful life when it ends up in the open
environment.

So you get to throw your pet’s waste without destroying the environment.

Here are more reasons you’ll love these strong poop bags:

  • – Made with 15 microns-thick plastic for greater strength.
  • – Well-sealed seams prevent the bags from ripping.

– The opaque design masks the contents of the bags.- Scented with a jasmine fragrance that keeps odor at bay.- Very easy to separate from the roll thanks to high-quality perforations.- Sized at 13” (L) x 9” (H) to handle poop from all breeds.- They leave you enough room at the top to create a knot.- Backed by a 100.

Go ahead, get heavy-duty biodegradable poop bags that you can toss guilt-free!
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16.14 x 1.57 x 0.5 inches; 11.99 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ MX-150B
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 7, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07W4M599X
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

MAKING PLASTIC SMARTER: Unlike other pet waste bags that harm the environment, ours lasts much shorter time if it gets into the open environment due to presence of d2w additive.
MASK THE MESS: No more cringing in disgust. Opaque, scented, and beautifully designed, these doggie bags for poop make picking up after your four-legged pal less of a nightmare.
EASY TO SEPARATE AND OPEN: High-quality perforations make separating the biodegradable poop bags a breeze. So you get to clear the mess much faster.
SIZED JUST RIGHT: Measuring 13” (L) x 9” (H), the pet poop bags are large enough to handle the largest of deposits. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now and start picking up your pup’s poop with confidence!

Read more

Lightly Scented

Our doggie poop bags are lightly scented to help mask those smelly odors. This is especially important if you need to walk some distance before you find a trash can or have to keep it in the car until you get home.

Fun Colors & Patterns

Who said poop bags have to be totally gross? We offer doggie poop bags in a variety of pet and owner-friendly colors including pink hearts, cute paws, bones and much more!

Thicker & Resilient Bags

Standard poop bags often tear or leak, especially if you have a larger dog. We’ve made our plastic bags 15 microns thick to withstand those late-night poop walks, dog park excited poops and all the other messy situations a pet owner winds up in.

Easy-Tear Perforations

Every bag is cleanly perforated and easy to tear off from the roll. The opaque design masks the contents of the bags. Try our dog waste bag dispensers to keep them on hand when it is needed!

Read more

push to open effortlessly and close automatically, creating you more safe and environmental driving journey

Handy bounce cover design is convenience for you to put garbage into it effortlessly and ensure the trash can sealed well to avoid unpleasant odors from escaping into the car.
【Easy Installation】 The auto trash bin back with high-strength hook which make it easy to install. Can be hung on the edge of the door and the back seat, or placed in the central console.
【Compact Size, Large Capacity, Space Less,】Tiny but functional car garbage bin will maintain your vehicle clean and organized yet do not occupy too much space of the car.
【Multi-function】This tiny trash bin also can be used as a storage box for umbrella, drink bottle and other small objects or be used as an ashtray, cup holder or coins holder. Besides it can be used in office, living room, kitchen, bedroom, dining room
【Universal Fit】Our small trash can with perfect size fits for every type of vehicle, including cars, trucks, minivans, SUVs, RVs, campers, boats, semis, buses, cabs/taxis, and more!
